data.text:
Chris Brown is a proud father of three children: Royalty, Aeko, and Lovely. Royalty, born in 2014, is his eldest daughter with model Nia Guzman. Brown discovered he was a father when Royalty was already 8 months old. He named his seventh studio album “Royalty” after her, highlighting the significance of his daughter in his life.

The “Don’t Wake Me Up” singer went on to welcome son Aeko with his ex-girlfriend Ammika Harris in 2019 and daughter Lovely with Diamond Brown in 2022.

He said – “I have a co-parenting job that’s pretty amazing, but learning how to be a dad, especially learning how to take care of somebody else … I barely know how to brush my teeth in the morning!” he said On Air with Ryan Seacrest of the challenges of becoming a father in 2015.

“It’s actually great,” he added of the experience. “It’s very humbling. It’s very calming. I think I was a lot, you know, rambunctious, very hyper as a kid, but now seeing that 10 times over, my daughter’s kind of mellowing me out.”

Aeko, born in 2019, is Brown’s son with ex-girlfriend Ammika Harris. Brown often shares heartfelt moments with Aeko, referring to him affectionately as “Aeko the Gecko.” His youngest child, Lovely Symphani, was born in January 2022 to Diamond Brown. The singer recently celebrated Lovely’s first birthday with a “Winter Wonderland” themed party, expressing his love and joy for his daughter on social media.

Chris Brown’s 3 Kids: All About Royalty, Aeko and Lovely

As of 2024, Chris Brown’s net worth is estimated to be around $50 million. This wealth primarily comes from his successful music career, which includes album sales, concert tours, and streaming revenues. Brown’s albums, such as “Exclusive” and “F.A.M.E.,” have sold millions of copies worldwide, and he continues to earn significant income from his extensive catalog of hit songs.

In addition to music, Brown has diversified his income through various business ventures, including a clothing line named Black Pyramid and ownership of 14 Burger King franchises. His acting roles in films like “Stomp the Yard” and “Takers” also contribute to his earnings. Brown’s endorsement deals and brand partnerships further bolster his financial portfolio.

Here’s everything to know about Chris Brown’s kids: Royalty, Aeko and Lovely –

1. Royalty Brown, 10

Royalty Brown, born on May 27, 2014, is the eldest child of Chris Brown and model Nia Guzman. Interestingly, Chris Brown only found out about his daughter when she was already 8 months old in March 2015. Since then, he and Guzman have been co-parenting Royalty, who has a half-sister named Sinatra from her mother’s side, and two half-siblings, Aeko and Lovely, from her father’s side.

Chris Brown was so inspired by Royalty that he named his seventh studio album “Royalty” after her. The album’s cover, revealed on Instagram, features a touching black-and-white photo of Brown holding his daughter, symbolizing their bond.

Their relationship is strong and full of love, as evidenced by the many heartfelt moments they share. For example, Royalty referred to Brown as the “best daddy ever” on Instagram during Father’s Day 2022. The duo often enjoys fun activities together, like visiting Halloween Horror Nights at Universal Studios, attending the Grammy Awards, and dancing.

Despite being just a child, Royalty is already making strides in the business world. She collaborates with her sister Sinatra on a vitamin C brand and serves as a brand ambassador for Fashion Nova, boasting over 1 million followers on Instagram. In December 2023, Royalty launched her jewelry line, Go Go Lush, which features vibrant and playful pieces. She expressed her excitement about the collection, encouraging everyone to enjoy the beautiful designs.

2. Aeko Catori Brown, 4

Chris Brown welcomed his second child, Aeko Catori Brown, on November 20, 2019, with his ex-girlfriend, Ammika Harris. Brown first hinted at Aeko’s birth by posting a black-and-white photo of himself looking down with the caption “11-20-2019.” A month later, he shared Aeko’s name and proudly showed his son’s face for the first time on social media.

In a now-deleted Instagram post, Brown humorously compared baby photos of himself and Aeko, noting the striking resemblance by saying, “He just stole my whole face.” This touching moment highlighted the bond between father and son.

Aeko recently celebrated his 4th birthday with a Bluey-themed party, with both parents present. Harris shared several photos from the celebration, capturing Aeko enjoying the festivities.

Lately, Aeko has been exploring modeling. He has appeared in promotional photos and videos for the children’s clothing company PatPat, which Harris often shares on her Instagram. This budding interest shows Aeko’s early start in the fashion world, following in his parents’ footsteps in the public eye.

3. Lovely Symphani Brown, 2

Lovely Symphani Brown was born on January 7, 2022, to Chris Brown and Diamond Brown. Diamond announced the happy news on Instagram, expressing her joy and love for their newborn daughter. She wrote, “The princess is here! Lovely Symphani Brown My sweet babygirl, it’s been a whole day you’ve been in the world and have already shown me the true meaning of life. I promise to love and protect you always. Forever yours, mommy.”

When Lovely turned three months old, Diamond shared a heartwarming photo of her in a red Gucci onesie, celebrating the milestone. Chris Brown reposted this on his Instagram Story, confirming his fatherhood with a series of heart emojis.

To celebrate Lovely’s first birthday in 2023, Chris and Diamond went all out with a grand party featuring a pony, roses, and lots of pink decorations. Diamond shared a beautiful family photo from the event, captioning it, “What a LOVELY day!” The celebration was a memorable occasion, filled with joy and love for their little girl.

Chris Brown Wife and his Kids Mother

Chris Brown has three children with three different mothers, but he is not currently married. His eldest child, Royalty Brown, was born on May 27, 2014, with model Nia Guzman. Royalty’s birth was confirmed through a DNA test, and she has since become a significant part of Brown’s life, inspiring him to name his seventh studio album after her.

His second child, Aeko Catori Brown, was born on November 20, 2019, with Ammika Harris, a model and social media influencer. Aeko’s birth brought much joy to Chris, who often shares pictures and moments with his son on social media​.

Chris’s youngest child, Lovely Symphani Brown, was born on January 7, 2022, with Diamond Brown, an Instagram model. The couple has not publicly confirmed a long-term relationship, but they share a commitment to co-parenting their daughter​.

Despite not being married, Chris Brown maintains active involvement in his children’s lives, sharing moments and expressing his love for them publicly.

Chris Brown Roasts Fan With Hilarious Comment After She Calls Him Out for ‘Multiple Baby Mamas’

Chris Brown recently made headlines with a humorous response to a fan’s comment about his family. On January 9, 2024, he shared a series of photos on Instagram featuring moments with his children: Royalty, Aeko, and Lovely. The post, which he captioned, “The best part of me is my kids,” drew attention and praise from fans. However, one commenter criticized Brown for having children with multiple mothers, saying, “Beautiful, but I do not want a man with multiple baby mamas.”

In a witty clapback, Chris responded, “Who said I was hiring ma’am? You say that like you had a chance [laughing emojis].” This response quickly gained attention for its sharp humor and light-hearted dismissal of the critique.

Conclusion

Chris Brown is a dedicated father to his three children: Royalty, Aeko, and Lovely. Each child has a different mother: Royalty was born in 2014 to Nia Guzman, Aeko in 2019 to Ammika Harris, and Lovely in 2022 to Diamond Brown. Despite the unique family dynamics, Brown remains committed to being actively involved in his children’s lives. Chris Brown’s recent interaction on social media, where he humorously responded to a fan’s comment about his multiple children’s mothers, highlights his engaging personality and dedication as a father.

How many baby mamas does Chris have?

The rapper has three baby mamas: Nia Guzman, Ammika Harris and Diamond Brown. Interestingly, they are all models. The rapper reportedly has different relationships with the three ladies. However, regardless of his momentary relationships, Chris Brown’s kids and their welfare always take centre stage.

Who gave birth to Chris Brown first child?

Chris Brown’s first child, Royalty Brown, was born to Nia Guzman on May 27, 2014. Guzman and Brown were not in a long-term relationship, but they co-parent Royalty, who is an important part of Chris Brown’s life​.

Who is Chris Brown Wife?

As of now, Chris Brown is not married and does not have a wife. He has three children with different mothers: Nia Guzman, Ammika Harris, and Diamond Brown. Despite his high-profile relationships and the mothers of his children being sometimes referred to as “baby mamas,” Chris Brown has not entered into a legal marriage with any of them.
